item.description:
We will be joining Global Expeditions Club members from all over the US and Canada on an exciting overland group tour through the Himalayas.

Travel with an adventurous group Sept 20 - Oct 6, 2012 on a tour to Tibet, India & Nepal. This is an exciting 17 day expedition through the heart of the Himalaya. This is the ancient overland route between two very exotic cities; Kathmandu, Nepal and Lhasa, Tibet, with a visit to Mt. Everest base camp and pre-trip stop at the amazing Taj Mahal in India.

Land Price: $3,643 (plus airfare)*
Group Airfare: $1,949**

*NO Single Supplement charge unless you specifically request a single room to yourself.
**As the group will need to travel between multiple countries together, we have arranged all international group airfare for this trip:
- Newark (EWR) to Delhi, India
- Delhi to Kathmandu, Nepal
- Kathmandu to Lhasa, Tibet
- Kathmandu to Newark (EWR)

For prices, details or to book your space on this tour, follow this link: www.HeadOutAdventures.com

NOTE: Head Out Adventures is the club's tour supplier for this group trip

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Demand for this trip is very high and space is limited. Be sure to get your spot early, as spaces will go very quickly!

Highlights:
* Group airfare starting and ending at Newark Airport (EWR) in New Jersey
* Excursion to Mt. Everest Base Camp in Tibet
* Passing through the mighty Himalayan range in comfortable 4X4 Land Cruisers
* Scenic flight over the Himalaya with views of Mt. Everest
* Visits to numerous active Tibetan monasteries that date back thousands of years
* Spectacular views of mother nature at her best & an ancient civilization that has changed little over the past 1,000+ years
* Visit to the Taj Mahal, one of the 7 Wonders of the World
* A chance to explore the exotic city of Kathmandu, Nepal
* Breakfast daily
* 4 star hotel in Delhi, India and Kathmandu, Nepal
* Superior hotels and best available guesthouses in Tibet

Places Visited: Lhasa, Tibet, Mt. Everest Base Camp, Kathmandu, Nepal, Himalayan Mountains, Taj Mahal, Delhi, Agra, India

-----------------------------------------------------------------

This group tour is being organized by the Global Expeditions Club: an international adventure travel club with over 16,000+ members. The tour operator that they are using to coordinate, book and run this trip is: Head Out Adventures. For more information visit their websites or contact the Global Expeditions Club at:

E-mail: info@GlobalExpeditionsClub.com
Phone: 1.617.645.7689

And, of course, if you have any questions you can always contact me or one of the other organizers through a meetup email!!

Make Friends. Travel the World.
item.name: Tibet & Nepal: A Group Expedition Through the Himalaya - 17 Days
